comments.content:
you mentioned Nike, and I note the swoosh. This suggests that it's probably an in-house Nike font.  
Don

Probably custom as Don said...  
You may like **[Stadium 1946](http://web.archive.org/web/20141016185355/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Stadium%201946%20-%20Regular&fid=7a033adb90cebf9b0ecf5ed89126ea31&fsize=60&text=RISK%20EVERYTHING&fit=1)** free font by Florian Mihr
